entries.m_greet: You there, I've got some Imperials chasing my tail. You're going to help me fight them off. You understand? If you don't, I'll make sure you regret it.
entries.a_greet: We've been chasing after this no good pirate for several days now. After hijacking a Star Destroyer captain's personal shuttle, he used it to break into the officer's home estate on Coruscant. Made a mess of the place and stole a lot of valuables including sensitive documents. I assume you'll be smart and not help this low life.
entries.m_yes: You're smart. They should be here soon. Get your weapon ready.
entries.m_no: Oh you are going to wish you didn't say that. I'll deal with you after I'm done with the Imps.
entries.m_thank_combat: It is a good thing you decided to help me blast them. Now get out of my sight.
entries.a_greet_rebel: We've been chasing after this no good pirate for several days now. After hijacking a Star Destroyer captain's personal shuttle, he used it to break into the officer's home estate on Coruscant. Made a mess of the place and stole a lot of valuables including sensitive documents. I have no problem fighting you too if need be, but I assume you'll be smart and not help this low life.
entries.a_greet_imperial: We've been chasing after this no good pirate for several days now. After hijacking a Star Destroyer captain's personal shuttle, he used it to break into the officer's home estate on Coruscant. Made a mess of the place and stole a lot of valuables including sensitive documents. Do your duty to the Empire and let us bring him to justice.
entries.m_maybe: Maybe? You got some plan to help me get away from them? You had better or I'm going to deal with you when I'm done with them.
entries.a_no: So you are just another pirate scum. Get them!
entries.a_maybe: The captain would definitely prefer having his valuables back. Go see if you can get that pirate to return the goods and pay for damages done.
entries.a_no_negotiate: The Empire does not negotiate with pirates, ever. This is how we deal with their kind&
entries.m_will_negotiate: Really? Hmm. I'm done playing with that shuttle anyway. Sure, I'll return all the stuff. I'll even pay their damages, but they had better forget they ever saw me.
entries.m_no_negotiate: And ruin my reputation?! What do you take me for? Now help me blast these Imps or else.
entries.a_decline_offer: He's a criminal and he must answer to the Empire for his crimes. There will be no deal.
entries.a_accept_offer: Very well, we'll work out the details with him. He had better return every last item, or he won't live to regret it.
entries.m_negotiate_greet: Did your little plan work, or am I going to need to get violent after all?
entries.response_negotiate: If you kill him, you won't get those documents back. Maybe I can help negotiate this matter?
entries.m_thank_negotiate: Well, I think I would have rather this ended with me blasting them off the face of this planet, but I suppose clearing my record is worth it this time. Thanks for your quick thinking.
entries.m_waiting: I think they're almost here. Do exactly as I say.
entries.m_greet_a: You got nothing, Imps! You think you can really take us down?
entries.a_respond_m_1: Us? I see. Are you really with this good for nothing pirate?
entries.a_thank_combat: You've done a great service to the Empire today. We'll rid the galaxy of these unsavory types for good one day.
entries.a_thank_negotiate: The Captain will be very pleased if this deal works out.
entries.minion_2: The Captain is going to be pleased when we take care of this.
entries.minion_4: I was there when he stole the shuttle. He's definitely bold, but not too smart.
entries.a_negotiate_fail: You just can't negotiate with pirates. It's not worth it.
entries.a_thank_negotiate_again: We'll get a full list of items and damages. If he lives up to his end, we'll look the other way for now.
entries.a_brushoff: You are lucky the Empire is here to protect you from pirates like him.
entries.a_tired_waiting: He's just trying to stall. Get him!
entries.a_no_progress: You are not wanted here anymore.
entries.m_saved: Heh, Imps can't hit nothing. I may get wasted by a bounty hunter someday, but never by anyone working for the Empire, believe me when I say that.
entries.m_betrayed: I warned you. Now I'm going to have to kill you too.
entries.m_sorry: What are you still doing here? I don't need you any more. Shove off.
